means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 拉斯特绰号，红发的或红润肤色的人，来源于古英语，含义是“锈色”(rust)
[地名] [奥地利、德国] 鲁斯特
Rust Engineering Co. <美国>鲁斯特工程公司

word_mean: 铁锈：金属铁置于潮湿环境时其表面形成的带红色的沉积物，即氧化铁或氢氧化铁，亦指其他金属置于潮湿环境时表面形成的类似沉积物
锈病：以形成铁锈样斑点为特征的植物疾病
锈，金属在大气中因腐蚀而产生的以氢氧化物和氧化物为主的腐蚀产物。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English rūst, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch roest, German Rost, also to red

entry.def: Rust is a brown substance that forms on iron or steel, for example when it comes into contact with water.

example.ex: Manufacturers are looking into building cars out of plastic to avoid the problem of rust.
example.tran: 制造商们正研究如何用塑料制造车辆，以避免生锈。

entry.def: When a metal object rusts, it becomes covered in rust and often loses its strength.

example.ex: Copper nails are better than iron nails because the iron rusts...
example.tran: 铜钉比铁钉好，因为铁会生锈。

example.ex: There was an old rusting bolt on the door.
example.tran: 门上有一个生锈的旧门闩。

entry.def: Rust is sometimes used to describe things that are reddish-brown in colour.

example.ex: ...turquoise woodwork with accent colours of rust and ochre.
example.tran: 主色调为深褐色和赭色的青绿色木制品

entry.def: Rust is a disease which affects plants. It is caused by a fungus.

means.word_mean: 1. a red or brown oxide coating on iron or steel caused by the action of oxygen and moisture
2. a reddish-brown discoloration of leaves and stems caused by a rust fungus
3. the formation of reddish-brown ferric oxides on iron by low-temperature oxidation in the presence of water
4. any of various fungi causing rust disease in plants
1. become destroyed by water, air, or an etching chemical such as an acid;
2. cause to deteriorate due to the action of water, air, or an acid;

sentences.sentence: "The steady dripping of water rusted the metal stopper in the sink"

example.en: I'm anxious to get off this old rust bucket.
example.zh: 我迫不急待地想离开这艘老爷驱逐舰。

example.en: Why don't I ever get assigned to a new ship? It's always some crummy rustpot!
example.zh: 为什么老不派我去一艘新船上干活？总是邋里邋遢的蹩脚船。

example.en: Please don't park your rust bucket in front of my house.
example.zh: 请不要把你的破车停放在我的屋前。

sentences.en: The mower is covered with rust.
My bike has rusted and needs oil.
sentences.cn: 我的自行车生锈了, 需要上油。

sentences.en: The rain will rust the iron roof.
sentences.cn: 雨水会使铁皮屋顶生锈。
